articles.title: Marvel Rivals first-ever PvE mode ‘Zombie Mode’ announced - Gematsu
articles.description: NetEase Games has announced Marvel Rivals’ first-ever player-versus-environment game mode, “Zombie Mode.” It will launch on October 23.

articles.title: MacBook Pro rumor points to OLED, touchscreen upgrades next year - The Verge
articles.description: A Bloomberg report claims Apple’s next major MacBook Pro revision will add touch screens and OLED displays in late 2026 or early 2027.

articles.title: Anthropic brings mad Skills to Claude - theregister.com
articles.description: : Teaching an old bot new tricks

articles.title: M5 MacBook Air Coming Spring 2026 With M5 Mac Studio and Mac Mini in Development - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple plans to launch MacBook Air models equipped with the new M5 chip in spring 2026, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. Apple is also...

articles.title: Microsoft’s vision for AI PCs looks a lot like another crack at Cortana - Ars Technica
articles.description: Copilot expands with an emphasis on creating and editing files, voice input.

articles.title: I Tried My Best to Completely Mess Up the Pilot of ‘Star Trek: Voyager’ - Gizmodo
articles.description: 'Across the Unknown,' the upcoming 'Star Trek: Voyager' video game that puts you in Captain Janeway's shoes, doesn't quite live up to its promise just yet.
